labels.value: Delivery of Ultra and Supra models can be made in the backyard, by contract there shouldn't be any stairways, floors, restricted access, slopes, levels or any other obstacle. For all other models, delivery will be in the driveway.
In order to complete the delivery, we need a direct, 36 inches wide, access. If there are stairs, levels, restricted accesses, slopes, landings or other obstacle, please list all the details below.

For materials already delivered or received, please make sure that all materials are accessible. If we are installing a heat pump or heater, be sure to position the equipment at the exact location where you would like it installed.
If this is an in-ground pool liner installation, please note that the installation will be done over two days. Please make sure to leave access to the pool during the 48 hours following the installation of the liner so that the technician can return to complete the work.

Acceptance of terms and conditions
1. Trevi reserves the right to correct any errors that may appear in taking service calls over the Internet. 2. Trevi will make every effort to perform the services within the time frame indicated, according to the proposed schedule, but assumes no responsibility for delays resulting from circumstances beyond its control or from inclement weather. 3. The owner authorizes Trevi to verify his or her credit information through the Internet payment system. 4. Should a breakdown occur during a pool repair or renovation, Trevi assumes no responsibility for labor, parts or equipment other than those purchased from Trevi.

5. A confirmation e-mail will be sent to you 72 hours before your scheduled appointment. Please note that you will be asked to confirm or decline the appointment by following the reply instructions on the e-mail. If we do not receive a response from you, your appointment will be rescheduled. 6. Travel costs will apply if your Trevi product is no longer under warranty. It is important to read your warranty documents carefully, which are available in the Instruction section of your customer area. This fee does not include the cost of repairs when the technician is at your home.
Please indicate your acceptance of Trevi's terms and conditions by clicking the following checkbox:

Opening/Closing contract for semi-inground swimming pools

RESERVE YOUR CONTRACT FOR 2 OR 3 YEARS (5% OR 10% REBATE)
If you choose a 2 or 3 year contract, discounts of 5% or 10% will be respectively applied to the closures, openings and options chosen, for each year of the contract.
Payment for subsequent years is due on August 31 of each year, to preserve your rebate. You will receive an annual e-mail reminding you to make your payment. You may also choose to pay in full immediately.
Closing and opening dates for subsequent years will initially be scheduled in the same week as the one chosen for the 1st year.

labels.value: Your presence is not required during the measuring. The technician will arrive between 7am and 9pm. However, we can contact you approximately 1 hour before the appointment if you wish to be present.

We are available to deliver the pool materials on {appointmentDate} . A reminder for delivery will be made 2 days before the confirmed date. It is impossible for us to give you a time slot (due to unpredictable traffic and the time of each delivery). The delivery person will notify you when he will be on his way to your home.

Please note that we will not deliver inside your home. Your delivery appointment is scheduled for {appointmentDate} . Please confirm ( 8 days ) minimum prior to the date in order for us to honor this appointment. Your presence is not required during the delivery. The deliveries are made between 7am and 8pm. You will be contacted by a project manager for an appointment to inspect the access and the property. Following this visit, you will be contacted by the excavator for an appointment as soon as weather permit’s it.
We strongly recommend that you read « Work Description and Requirements» in order to be aware of all construction steps that will follow.
Access with a minimum width of 6 feet for the delivery of materials;
Your temporary fence with sufficient stakes;

The delivery team is equipped with a manual palette jack. Depending on the ground conditions, it may not be possible to deliver the material in the back yard. If the ground conditions are not adequate, the palettes will be placed in the driveway or the garage;

You must provide a space of 12 feet by 12 feet to receive the material. The location the material is stored cannot be in the access for the excavation equipment in the work area where the excavation will take place.

If you already have your sidewalk or pavement (surplus not included in your pool contract) implementation plan drawn and you want to add that extra to your contract, it is important that the addition is done as quickly as possible with your representative in order prevent any delays with the excavation of your pool.
Here is the list of what our construction department requires to begin your installation:

labels.categories: Formulaires de suivi et guest user

labels.value: The link is no longer valid or has expired.
We need direct access from the street to the yard for moving materials, which will be done using a wheelbarrow.
how many inches is it unlevelled?
Please make sure you have selected the location of the pool by placing a stake in the center of the chosen location.
Is it a grass covered area?
Is the new pool being installed in the same place?

A garden hose is required for the installation even if you have chosen to use a water tank to fill the pool. The installers will require the hose for the installation and placement of your liner. We suggest you contact your municipality to find out the bi-law regulations regarding the installation of an above ground pool. Some municipalities require a permit. * If you have a patio that will be adjacent to the pool, please ensure that there is a clearance of 18 inches between the patio and the edge of the pool. Following the installation of the pool, you can make the necessary adjustments to your patio. Please make sure that the electrical connections are made according to the recommendations given in each of the instruction manuals. The connection of the pump must be on a direct outside socket without an extension cord. We confirm that the installation will be on
Are there any rocks, stumps, roots, trees, or electrical wire?
Has the original pool been taken down?
Are you are replacing an existing pool?
Please specify a location with its tax group to calculate the tax.

Trévi offers luxury opening service. The swimming pool has a cover aged 8 years or less.This option requires 2 additional visits at opening and includes: emptying the pool, washing the liner, step and crowning. The customer must fill the pool up to the first step at the bottom. The technician will return to collect his equipment. The pool must then be completely filled by the customer in order to proceed with the opening. Please note that an additional fee of $35/bag will be applied for bags of leaves/waste that will be removed from the pool.

Please ensure that all materials are accessible and placed near the location of the installation.
The base of the gazebo should be level and ready for installation.
Please identify the specific location of the installation by placing stakes at the 4 extremities.

I wish to make the payment for the current year only (I commit to making the annual payment for subsequent years upon receiving the payment email).

Please refer to the schedule of upcoming payments. These amounts may vary if changes are made following this email.
The payment can be made online via your financial institution's website. You can add Trevi as a payee and enter your customer number as the account number. You can also pay in a Trevi store in cash or bank draft, payable to Magasins Trévi Inc.. The payment for the delivery must be made 15 days before the week stipulated on the contract. The other(s) payment(s) must be made 24 to 48 hours before the appointment. The technician will ask to see a proof of payment.

7 - The customer agrees to remove all debris from the winter cover before the opening
